channel.title: Julia Garner on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Box Office: ‘Freakier Friday’ and ‘Weapons’ Load Up for Late-Summer Showdown
item.description: Disney’s body swap sequel hopes to be another win for big screen comedies following ‘Naked Gun,’ while Zach Cregger’s acclaimed ‘Weapons’ hopes to reengage horror fans.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Freakier Friday’ and ‘Weapons’ Load Up for Late-Summer Showdown
item.description: Disney’s body swap sequel hopes to be another win for big screen comedies following ‘Naked Gun,’ while Zach Cregger’s acclaimed ‘Weapons’ hopes to reengage horror fans.

item.title: Josh Brolin and Julia Garner Clash in ‘Weapons’ But Their Bond Off-Screen Was “Cellular, Sibling Sh**”
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe alums traded compliments at the ‘Weapons’ premiere in L.A. “We just hit it off immediately,” Brolin said with a smile. “We hung out a lot, which never happens.”

item.title: Josh Brolin and Julia Garner Clash in ‘Weapons’ But Their Bond Off-Screen Was “Cellular, Sibling Sh**”
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe alums traded compliments at the ‘Weapons’ premiere in L.A. “We just hit it off immediately,” Brolin said with a smile. “We hung out a lot, which never happens.”

item.title: ‘Weapons’ Review: Julia Garner and Josh Brolin in Zach Cregger’s Enthrallingly Strange but Psychologically Lite Follow-Up to ‘Barbarian’
item.description: Alden Ehrenreich, Austin Abrams and Amy Madigan also star in this horror mystery about the disappearance one night of 17 elementary school classmates.

item.title: Julia Garner Recalls Audition Process for Madonna Biopic That’s “Supposed to Still Happen”
item.description: The actress landed the Queen of Pop role in 2022, but the film has faced several stops and starts since then.

item.title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Review: Pedro Pascal and Vanessa Kirby Lead Appealing New Crew to Break Marvel Property’s Six-Decade Curse
item.description: Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Joseph Quinn and Julia Garner also star in Matt Shakman’s superhero adventure, in which the team must save Earth from a “Devourer of Worlds.”
